title: Video: WU LYF – We Bros
content:
With a Q Award under their belt, as well as one of the finest albums of the year, Mancunian quartet WU LYF are rounding off the year by releasing a new single from their critically acclaimed debut record.

We Bros comes with remixes from tour mates S. Mahabra and Young Montana? alongside a brand new video. Directed by Sam Pilling, the five minute clip documents the now infamous WU LYF spirit of freedom, equality and uncensored expressionism. Following a group of youths breaking free from the shackles of an industrialised city, there’s a real sense of belonging in the video, one upon which the entire WU LYF experience is grounded. Check out the video below.

WU LYF – WE BROS from LUCIFER YOUTH FILM on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
